      • getActions

        public Action[] getActions()
                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                           java.lang.InstantiationException
        Description copied from interface: Step
        Get the actions that can be performed from this step. The returned array contains only the actions for which the condition method canBePerformed returns true.
        Specified by:
        getActions in interface Step
        Returns:
